languages.text: "Сегодня вы наш{mf||а} спаситель{mf||ница}, Звездное Сиятельство. И в благодарность, прошу, примите этот именной меч из моей сокровищницы. Когда-то "Судьбоносный" решил ход одной из наших междоусобиц: им был убит лидер мятежников — и с тех пор на планете воцарился мир".
languages.translation_comment: FakeGovernor. Передает FW_Prize_MoraliteAftermath_item — меч. Если ок — сказать об этом ГД (!)

traits.locale_text: "Сегодня вы наш спаситель, Ваше Сиятельство. И в благодарность, прошу, примите этот именной меч из моей сокровищницы. Когда-то "Судьбоносный" решил ход одной из наших междоусобиц: им был убит лидер мятежников — и с тех пор на планете воцарился мир". {n}Вы замечаете ироничную ухмылку на лице палача.{/n} "Пусть же это легендарное оружие станет вашим верным союзником на поле битвы".

languages.translation_comment: FakeGovernor. Передает FW_Prize_MoraliteAftermath_item — меч. Если ок — сказать об этом ГД (!)

languages.text: "You are our saviour today, Your Celestial Highness. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."
languages.original_text: "Сегодня вы наш{mf||а} спаситель{mf||ница}, Звездное Сиятельство. И в благодарность, прошу, примите этот именной меч из моей сокровищницы. Когда-то "Судьбоносный" решил ход одной из наших междоусобиц: им был убит лидер мятежников — и с тех пор на планете воцарился мир".

traits.locale_text: "You are our saviour today, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

"You are our saviour today, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

"You are our saviour today, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. The Sword of Destiny once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

"You are our saviour today, Your Celestial Highness. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

"You are our saviour today, Your Celestial Highness. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

"You are our saviour today, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

"You are our saviour today, Your Celestial {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

languages.text: “您真的是我们的救世主，来自上界的大人。为了感谢您，请收下这把宝剑吧。这是我的私人藏品，这把命运的使者曾经决定过一场血战的结果——在那场冲突中，它杀死了一名叛军领袖。自那之后，这颗行星就恢复了和平。”
languages.original_text: "You are our saviour today, Your Celestial Highness. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

traits.locale_text: “您真的是我们的救世主，来自上界的大人。为了感谢您，请收下这把宝剑吧。这是我的私人藏品，这把命运的使者曾经决定过一场血战的结果——在那场冲突中，它杀死了一名叛军领袖。自那之后，这颗行星就恢复了和平。”

languages.text: «Nos ha salvado hoy, Excelencia Celestial. Y como muestra de gratitud, le ruego que acepte esta espada personalizada de mi tesoro personal. En una ocasión, la Heraldo del destino zanjó una de nuestras rencillas matando a un cabecilla rebelde, y desde entonces ha reinado la paz en este planeta».
languages.original_text: "You are our saviour today, Your Celestial Highness. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

traits.locale_text: «Nos ha salvado hoy, Excelencia Celestial. Y como muestra de gratitud, le ruego que acepte esta espada personalizada de mi tesoro personal. En una ocasión, la Heraldo del destino zanjó una de nuestras rencillas matando a un cabecilla rebelde, y desde entonces ha reinado la paz en este planeta».

languages.text: "Günü kurtardınız Semavi Efendimiz. Minnetimin simgesi olarak hazinemden bu özel kılıcı kabul buyurun. Kaderin Cilvesi, bir zamanlar kan davalarımızdan birinin sonucunu belirlemişti. Bir asi liderin canını aldı. O zamandan beri gezegende barış hüküm sürüyor."
languages.original_text: "You are our saviour today, Your Celestial Highness. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

traits.locale_text: "Günü kurtardınız Semavi Efendimiz. Minnetimin simgesi olarak hazinemden bu özel kılıcı kabul buyurun. Kaderin Cilvesi, bir zamanlar kan davalarımızdan birinin sonucunu belirlemişti. Bir asi liderin canını aldı. O zamandan beri gezegende barış hüküm sürüyor."

languages.text: 「あなたは今日の救世主です、天の閣下。感謝の意を表して、私の宝物からこの名前入りの剣をお受け取りください。破滅をもたらす者がかつて、不和の一つの結果を裁定されました。この剣は反乱軍の首領を殺し、それ以来この惑星には平和が行き渡っています」
languages.original_text: "You are our saviour today, Your Celestial Highness. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは今日の救世主です、天の閣下。感謝の意を表して、私の宝物からこの名前入りの剣をお受け取りください。破滅をもたらす者がかつて、不和の一つの結果を裁定されました。この剣は反乱軍の首領を殺し、それ以来この惑星には平和が行き渡っています」

languages.text: « Vous êtes notre {mf|sauveur|sauveuse}, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Veuillez accepter en gage de reconnaissance cette épée personnalisée tout droit sortie de mes coffres personnels. Fut un temps où Porte-destin détermina l'issue d'une guerre intestine en tuant un chef rebelle, marquant ainsi le début d'une ère de paix qui perdure à ce jour sur notre planète. »
languages.original_text: "You are our saviour today, Your Celestial Highness. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes notre {mf|sauveur|sauveuse}, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Veuillez accepter en gage de reconnaissance cette épée personnalisée tout droit sortie de mes coffres personnels. Fut un temps où Porte-destin détermina l'issue d'une guerre intestine en tuant un chef rebelle, marquant ainsi le début d'une ère de paix qui perdure à ce jour sur notre planète. »

languages.text: "Ihr habt uns gerettet, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Nehmt als Dank bitte dieses Namensschwert aus meiner Schatzkammer entgegen. Schicksalsbringer hat einst den Ausgang einer unserer Fehden bestimmt. Es hat einen Rebellenführer getötet, und seitdem herrscht Frieden auf dem Planeten."
languages.original_text: "You are our saviour today, Your Celestial Highness. And in gratitude, please accept this personalised sword from my treasury. Fatebringer once decided the outcome of one of our feuds: it killed a rebel leader, and peace has reigned on the planet ever since."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt uns gerettet, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Nehmt als Dank bitte dieses Namensschwert aus meiner Schatzkammer entgegen. Schicksalsbringer hat einst den Ausgang einer unserer Fehden bestimmt. Es hat einen Rebellenführer getötet, und seitdem herrscht Frieden auf dem Planeten."
